statement 2 although the ambiance is fun it lacks the level of kidfriendliness found at other local places the waitstaff members have an appealing appearance but their friendliness falls somewhat short this venue caters more towards the energetic atmosphere of happy hour and latenight revelry preferred by those in their twenties nevertheless the food only meets average standards

its unfortunate to witness the persistently sluggish service at this restaurant its high time the management takes action and provides retraining for their employees after enduring my third visit which turned out to be as dissatisfying as the previous two ive decided that three strikes are more than enough for me to call it quits
ive been consistently satisfied with the exceptional quality of the pizza and service provided here as well as their reliable delivery service

my previous visits to this location included an encounter with an exceptionally discourteous female staff member if their abilities in providing exemplary customer service are restricted to being just a barista i imagine i shall refrain from going back there again

when i visited around 4pm on a friday the bar already had a large crowd and offered an extensive variety of beers to choose from both outdoor seating and plenty of indoor seats were available although it might be challenging to reach the bar if it was crowded is it possible that they provide table service later in the evening furthermore the prices seemed to be average

can you have a bar that goes through different degrees of busyness ranging from moderately active to highly bustling and still encounter challenges in covering your costs im on the lookout for a remedy
the combination of topquality cuisine extensive variety of dishes and wellinformed personnel in this establishment makes it a mustvisit
love the location and the salon is super cute ciera cut and colored my hair left looking and feeling like a new woman will def go back

there are several reasons to avoid hiltons old property  the rooms are outdated and dirty the grounds are not wellmaintained the staff is rude and ignorant and the water park attracts a rowdy crowd that requires nightly intervention from the police

indulging in a heavenly brunch

we had to wait for about 20 minutes until we managed to grab some seats at this wonderful venue however the food surpassed what we anticipated and the service from the team was exceptionally welcoming and friendly

the pizza may come from a chain yet it exceeds expectations in terms of flavor with an assortment of delectable crust options youll find yourself fully satisfied the similarity between their howie bread and dominos breadsticks may not be exceptional but the additional flavors greatly elevate their enjoyability moreover the affordability factor is worth noting

the employees are exceptionally amiable and were thrilled to witness the diverse assortment of parrots and other birds they have available despite the considerable distance from my southwestern whereabouts it provides a delightful opportunity to indulge in birdwatching while browsing through their plant offerings
this establishment never fails to deliver both delicious pizza and excellent customer service while their prompt and efficient delivery service ensures a consistently positive experience

it is recommended to avoid the overpriced and unsavory taco salad which should ideally be priced at 199 instead of an extravagant 699

the reviews for this place were so good i was really excited to place my take out order i really like vegetables so i ordered all vegetarian items and i have to say it was just meh  oh well i guess im still looking for that one great place for chinese in the se valley
with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting

i experienced an unusual occurrence when i ordered two separate entrees only to discover that they were disappointingly indistinguishable it became quite perplexing for me to determine which dish was which since both exhibited a strikingly similar sweet and sour sauce flavor despite my clear request for something different additionally the absence of fried rice a customary inclusion at panda express was also disheartening to put it frankly this indicates that panda express fares much better in terms of quality compared to this particular place
at this eatery the quality of both the pizza and customer service has consistently impressed me and my encounters with their delivery service have always been satisfactory
the pizza here is delicious and the service is excellent and my experience with their delivery service has been positive thus far
